title: Taylor Spurling’s Resume
text:
Data Analyst

LinkedIn Profile


Phone: 812.371.1447
Email: taylorspurling@gmail.com




Brigham Young University - Idaho

Bachelor of Science in Business Analytics
Looking to go into Data Analysis
Expert knowledge of Microsoft Office (Excel, Word)
Experience with Data Visualization Programs (Tableau, Power BI/DAX)
Growing understanding of Python, SQL, and R








Assistant of LMS and Academic Technology Support

Rexburg, Idaho
April 2020 - July 2024
Provided specialized in-person, email, and phone training and support to over 300 faculty members
Dealt with a variety of programs such as Canvas, Microsoft & Google Suite, Zoom, and Perusall






Strategic Operations Intern

Indianapolis, Indiana
May 2023 - August 2023
Automized a data reconciliation process that originally took 20+ minutes down to less than 5 minutes
Validated company data with many different partners through robust Microsoft Excel formulas
Dashboard creation through Power BI






Full-Time Volunteer Representative

Guided others to set weekly goals and determine plans to accomplish these goals
Served 85+ hours a week
Led weekly and monthly training for 20-30 volunteers
Became fluent in Cambodian (Khmer)






Supervisor/Sales Associate

Phnom Penh, Cambodia (January 2018 - February 2020)
Edinburg, Indiana (October 2014 - August 2017)
Greeted and interacted with customers by answering questions, improving visual merchandising, and providing customer service
Operated and trained others on cash registers, managed transactions, and balanced cash drawers
Oversaw success of 30+ employees by analyzing daily sales goals and teaching sales tactics







Financial & Managerial Accounting
Spreadsheet Analysis for Business
Database Design & Development
Economic Principles Micro & Macro
